audio_sermons.title: A Testimony Of The Jesus Movement And The Need For Gatherings
audio_sermons.description: Brother Blaine shares about the history of the Jesus Movement and some testimonies of how they were assembled by the Lord. He also shares on the gathering of believers that were led of the Holy Spirit for great fellowship and revival. He calls for the same in our day to see gatherings of believers where Jesus Christ is glorified.
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
Blaine Scogin ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Blaine Scogin in mp3 format. Brother Blaine is a believer in Little Rock, Arkansas. He was saved during the Jesus Movement in America many years ago. His burden now is greatly for the persecuted church. He now runs a prayer ministry conference call "Persecution Watch" that gathers 3 times a week: Tuesday's, Thursday's and Saturday. The call is 8pm CST each night. Number is 209.255.1000. The Access code is 109083#
